title: Jackson and Dayton, Church Complaints, R. Kelly, NFL and NBA Talk, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Jackson and Dayton, Church Complaints, R. Kelly, NFL and NBA Talk, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The crew is back and we welcome Jackson and Dayton to The Steve Harvey Nation. Church Complaints is here and contraband is missing. R. Kelly has a docuseries on Lifetime that got the people talking. The NFL Playoffs are set and the fellas also share with us their Top 5 NBA Players of All-Time. In Closing Remarks, Big Dog explains one door closing and another one opening, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
